name: Death Tycoon - Evil Clicker
description:
Let’s see how well the dead are willing to pay for tasty food and how much you can develop your new business. Join the fun of this business adventure, will you be the new tycoon of the Underworld?

FEATURES:
Automate your workflow
Expand your businesses and increase your idle income
Hire staff to increase revenue
Prestige to new lands
No internet connection needed

Become a Mogul!


Feel free to send a message to:
indiesupport@generagames.com
- We want to hear your feedback!

>> The Death Tycoon Team <<

Please note: Death Tycoon is free to play game but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

Visit us:
https://generagames.com
